Sentencas: As widely used electrolyte materials in intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells, the acceptor-doped CeO2 possesses not only high oxygen-ionic conductivity but also nonnegligible electronic conductivity.
Titulo: Revealing the impact of the voltage-induced interfacial effect on conduction properties of CeO2-based electrolyte: A modeling investigation

Sentencas: It has been experimentally confirmed that the voltage-induced interfacial effect can significantly affect the properties of the CeO2-based electrolyte.
Titulo: Revealing the impact of the voltage-induced interfacial effect on conduction properties of CeO2-based electrolyte: A modeling investigation

Sentencas: However, the voltage-induced interfacial effect is not yet properly treated in modeling studies concerning the charged defect distribution in the CeO2-based electrolyte.
Titulo: Revealing the impact of the voltage-induced interfacial effect on conduction properties of CeO2-based electrolyte: A modeling investigation

Sentencas: In this study, a new mathematical model of mixed oxygen-ionic and electronic conducting electrolyte, considering the voltage-induced interfacial effect upon the charged defect distributions within the electrolyte layer, is built.
Titulo: Revealing the impact of the voltage-induced interfacial effect on conduction properties of CeO2-based electrolyte: A modeling investigation

Sentencas: The mathematical treatment of the model based on the finite element method is clearly presented.
Titulo: Revealing the impact of the voltage-induced interfacial effect on conduction properties of CeO2-based electrolyte: A modeling investigation

Sentencas: The good agreements between the experimental data and model-predicted results at both open-circuit and operation conditions well validate the developed model.
Titulo: Revealing the impact of the voltage-induced interfacial effect on conduction properties of CeO2-based electrolyte: A modeling investigation

Sentencas: The modeling results elucidate that output voltages can significantly affect the distribution of charged defects, particularly for the localized electron, then further influencing its mixed conduction properties and behaviors.
Titulo: Revealing the impact of the voltage-induced interfacial effect on conduction properties of CeO2-based electrolyte: A modeling investigation

Sentencas: The results of this work can provide fundamental insight into the mixed ionic and electronic conducting properties and behaviors of the CeO2-based electrolyte.
Titulo: Revealing the impact of the voltage-induced interfacial effect on conduction properties of CeO2-based electrolyte: A modeling investigation
